text: Tinkomboleche kunchelewasya jwamunsachile mwa ŵanganyao, ni kunkumbatisya kukwenu jwamunsachile. Sano naga n’di munsachilile ajula jwamum’bisile pambali tipaŵe pangali ulemwa kukwenu (kunkumbatisya kukwenu). Yalakweyo ni yakuŵandichila kuti meso gao gateteŵale, nambo soni kuti akadandaula, ni ayisengwele yamwapele ŵanganyao ŵanaose. Sano Allah akumanyilila yaili m’mitima mwenu, ni aŵele Allah Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwakutulala nnope ntima
